fireplace_cheap.name: Fireplace (2 Clay)
fireplace_cheap.summary: Cook animals and Vegetables; bake Grain into bread
fireplace_cheap.body: Cost: 2 Clay. At any time, cook animals into Food (Sheep → 2 Food, Wild Boar → 2 Food, Cattle → 3 Food) or cook Vegetables into 2 Food. When you take a Bake bread action, convert 1 Grain into 2 Food. Can be upgraded to a Cooking Hearth by taking a Cooking Hearth and returning this card to the board.
fireplace_cheap.extra: 1 Victory Point. May be upgraded to a Cooking Hearth.

fireplace_expensive.name: Fireplace (3 Clay)
fireplace_expensive.summary: Cook animals and Vegetables; bake Grain into bread
fireplace_expensive.body: Cost: 3 Clay. At any time, cook animals into Food (Sheep → 2 Food, Wild Boar → 2 Food, Cattle → 3 Food) or cook Vegetables into 2 Food. When you take a Bake bread action, convert 1 Grain into 2 Food. Can be upgraded to a Cooking Hearth by taking a Cooking Hearth and returning this card to the board.
fireplace_expensive.extra: 1 Victory Point. May be upgraded to a Cooking Hearth.

cooking_hearth_cheap.name: Cooking Hearth (4 Clay)
cooking_hearth_cheap.summary: Better cooking than a Fireplace; bake Grain into more Food
cooking_hearth_cheap.body: Cost: 4 Clay (or upgrade from a Fireplace by returning it to the board). At any time, cook animals into Food or cook Vegetables into 3 Food. When you take a Bake bread action, convert 1 Grain into 3 Food. Produces 1 more Food than a Fireplace when baking bread or cooking Vegetables, Wild Boar, and Cattle.

cooking_hearth_expensive.name: Cooking Hearth (5 Clay)
cooking_hearth_expensive.summary: Better cooking than a Fireplace; bake Grain into more Food
cooking_hearth_expensive.body: Cost: 5 Clay (or upgrade from a Fireplace by returning it to the board). At any time, cook animals into Food or cook Vegetables into 3 Food. When you take a Bake bread action, convert 1 Grain into 3 Food. Produces 1 more Food than a Fireplace when baking bread or cooking Vegetables, Wild Boar, and Cattle.

clay_oven.name: Clay Oven
clay_oven.summary: Bake 1 Grain into 5 Food; bake once immediately on purchase
clay_oven.body: Cost: 3 Clay and 1 Stone. When you take a Bake bread action, convert at most 1 Grain from your supply into 5 Food. Immediately after purchasing this Oven, you may take a one-time Bake bread action.
clay_oven.extra: 2 Victory Points. May be upgraded by certain Minor Improvements.

stone_oven.name: Stone Oven
stone_oven.summary: Bake up to 2 Grain into 4 Food each; bake once immediately on purchase
stone_oven.body: Cost: 1 Clay and 3 Stone. When you take a Bake bread action, convert up to 2 Grain from your supply into 4 Food each. Immediately after purchasing this Oven, you may take a one-time Bake bread action.
stone_oven.extra: 3 Victory Points. May be upgraded by certain Minor Improvements.

joinery.name: Joinery
joinery.summary: Convert Wood to Food each Harvest; bonus points for Wood stockpiles
joinery.body: Cost: 2 Stone and 2 Wood. During each Harvest, you may convert up to 1 Wood from your supply into Food. At the end of the game, earn Bonus points based on the amount of Wood in your supply.
joinery.extra: 2 Victory Points plus Bonus points for Wood at end of game.

pottery.name: Pottery
pottery.summary: Convert Clay to Food each Harvest; bonus points for Clay stockpiles
pottery.body: Cost: 2 Stone and 2 Clay. During each Harvest, you may convert up to 1 Clay from your supply into Food. At the end of the game, earn Bonus points based on the amount of Clay in your supply.
pottery.extra: 2 Victory Points plus Bonus points for Clay at end of game.

basketmakers_workshop.name: Basketmaker's Workshop
basketmakers_workshop.summary: Convert Reed to Food each Harvest; bonus points for Reed stockpiles
basketmakers_workshop.body: Cost: 2 Stone and 2 Reed. During each Harvest, you may convert up to 1 Reed from your supply into Food. At the end of the game, earn Bonus points based on the amount of Reed in your supply.
basketmakers_workshop.extra: 2 Victory Points plus Bonus points for Reed at end of game.

well.name: Well
well.summary: Provides 1 Food at the start of each of the next 5 rounds
well.body: Cost: 3 Stone and 1 Wood. When purchased, place 1 Food on each of the next 5 Round card spaces (up to Round 14). At the start of each of those rounds, you receive the Food placed on that space.
